title: IBM Storage Ceph as a Service
introduction: IBM® Storage Ceph® as a Service is a powerful software-defined enterprise storage platform that delivers a cloud-like experience on-premises with the convenience and flexibility of a pay-as-you-go model. Designed to provision storage in minutes, it enables self-provisioning of storage resources, allowing enterprises to quickly adapt to rapidly changing demands, breaking down the barriers of managing multiple dedicated storage systems. Leverage the docs, API & SDK reference, architecture references, and more to support your app development needs.
